attributes.action: Revoke the right for pedophiles and sex offenders to change their name
attributes.additional_details: Because it is disgusting that they are allowed brand new lives when other non-violent criminals have to be judged their entire lives
attributes.background: I want pedophiles and sex offenders to no longer be able to change their names as it gives them access to new life’s without a criminal background which lets them directly back into schools and care homes for them to re-offend

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628930
